name: MTLIndirectRenderCommand
desc: A render command in an indirect command buffer.

items.name: func setRenderPipelineState(MTLRenderPipelineState)
items.desc: Sets the render pipeline state object used by the command.

items.name: func setVertexBuffer(MTLBuffer, offset: Int, at: Int)
items.desc: Sets a vertex buffer argument for the command.

items.name: func setFragmentBuffer(MTLBuffer, offset: Int, at: Int)
items.desc: Sets a fragment buffer argument for the command.

items.name: func drawPrimitives(MTLPrimitiveType, vertexStart: Int, vertexCount: Int, instanceCount: Int, baseInstance: Int)
items.desc: Encodes a command to render a number of instances of primitives using vertex data in contiguous array elements, starting from the base instance.

items.name: func drawIndexedPrimitives(MTLPrimitiveType, indexCount: Int, indexType: MTLIndexType, indexBuffer: MTLBuffer, indexBufferOffset: Int, instanceCount: Int, baseVertex: Int, baseInstance: Int)
items.desc: Encodes a command to render a number of instances of primitives using an index list specified in a buffer, starting from the base vertex of the base instance.

items.name: func drawPatches(Int, patchStart: Int, patchCount: Int, patchIndexBuffer: MTLBuffer?, patchIndexBufferOffset: Int, instanceCount: Int, baseInstance: Int, tessellationFactorBuffer: MTLBuffer, tessellationFactorBufferOffset: Int, tessellationFactorBufferInstanceStride: Int)
items.desc: Encodes a command to render a number of instances of tessellated patches.

items.name: func drawIndexedPatches(Int, patchStart: Int, patchCount: Int, patchIndexBuffer: MTLBuffer?, patchIndexBufferOffset: Int, controlPointIndexBuffer: MTLBuffer, controlPointIndexBufferOffset: Int, instanceCount: Int, baseInstance: Int, tessellationFactorBuffer: MTLBuffer, tessellationFactorBufferOffset: Int, tessellationFactorBufferInstanceStride: Int)
items.desc: Encodes a command to render a number of instances of tessellated patches, using a control point index buffer.

items.name: func reset()
items.desc: Resets the command to its default state.
